name: ROCKETCOPTER [Lessons in Physics]
description:
- Take control of the Rocketcopter as you "learn" about physics in a collection of 4 physics based mini games. BOOK STACK where you will have to stack as many books as you can before time runs out. ENCHANTED TOMES find and deliver the "enchanted" books, but be careful because picking up an enchanted tome will give you a random curse. COLORED CRATES deliver the colored crates to the correct platform, see how many you can get before time runs out. SWING SHOTS shoot moving targets with the swinging cannon attachment.

CONTROLS:

(flight controls will remain the same but the action controls will change depending on the game)

W/S = Forward/Backward
A/D = Strafe L/R
Spacebar = Upward Thrust
Left Shift = Downward Thrust
Left Mouse = Grabber Grab
Right Mouse = Release Grabber
Scroll Wheel = Raise/Lower Grabber

P = Pause/Unpause

= WE'RE YOUR FRIENDS,WE'RE NOT LIKE THE OTHERS =
